730218f-a.title: General view - [Manhattan - 4th Street - Avenue A (North).]
730218f-a.text:
A general view, north from 4th Street and Ave., A.
August 31, 1928.
P. L. Sperr.

715854f-a.text:
Ave A at S.E. corner of 4th Street, across clearing at S.W. corner.

August 31, 1928

P.L. Sperr, Photographer.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.

715855f-a.text:
Avenue A at N.E. corner of 4th Street.

August 31, 1928.

P.L. Sperr, Photographer.

710887f-a.text:
Fourth Street, southeast corner and Avenue A, looking east

June 26, 1941

P.L. Sperr

Neg.No. A-920

732817f-c.title: Recreation and hobbies - Bird raising.
732817f-c.text:
Recreation and Hobbies: Bird raising on East Side roof as viewed southward from another tenement roof on East 4th Street to the west of Avenue A.

The buildings in the foreground are No's. 166 to 170 East 4th Street, that with the pigeon coop atop is No. 168.

In the background appears the steeple of St. Nicholas Catholic Church at No. 125 East 2nd Street.

August 31, 1928
P. L. Sperr

Views 2 and 3 show pigeon coops in the suburban
parts of Brooklyn.

View 2 P.L.Sperr  July 27, 1935
Neg. #2707
View 3: E.L. Armbruster Collection  About 1922
732817f-c.folder: 4th Street (East) and Avenue A  , Manhattan, N.Y.
